markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Primal Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=613) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 199 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
bloodline that grants primal spells

</column>

---

You can call upon the creatures of the wild for aid. You gain an additional spell slot of your highest level, which you can use only to cast [_summon animal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=316) or [_summon plants or fungus_](/Spells.aspx?ID=325). You can cast either of these spells using that spell slot, even if it they aren’t in your spell repertoire.

<title level="2">Primal Evolution leads to...</title>
[Greater Physical Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=1825), [Greater Vital Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=627)
name: Primal Evolution
